title: A friend of my family lost his farm to a fire today
body:
So I decided i'd play a Nasus game and farm up in his honor...

http://i.imgur.com/h8KTqbG.jpg

so... mission accomplished?

(saw him being super chill about it so no need to worry too much on this side, no one was injured in the fire either)

also riot captcha to login is getting ridiculous

http://i.imgur.com/xf0XfqB.jpg

replies.body: Did it happen to be the fire that killed 40 horses? (RIP)

> [{quoted}](name=Licojee,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=iweLEJHa,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-01-05T23:38:54.141+0000)
>
> Did it happen to be the fire that killed 40 horses? (RIP)

no, it was a fire that destroyed the heating section of his greenhouses tree plantation. A few tree trunks burned, but no animal life was lost there :)

although someone else lost fifty thousand ducks in a similar fire just a week earlier, and that's really tragic :\
spoiler alert, you can type whatever you want into the captcha

> [{quoted}](name=regaline,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=iweLEJHa,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-01-05T22:44:57.558+0000)
>
> spoiler alert, you can type whatever you want into the captcha

but then the captcha is free to tell you that what you entered was incorrect and you have to try again ; ;

Sorry to hear about your friend. :c Glad to hear everyone's okay! 

Also, nice game!

I think that captcha says 5908 not 5808... gg captchas OP.

I'm curious, did Riot actually make the captcha thing for their site or is it a thing that everyone just uses because when it isn't stupid it works.

Where's your Sheen? Sheen + 100 stacks = 350 damage Q!
had to skip sheen that game cause we were getting curbstomped by the enemy team early on and frozen heart just seemed more appropriate at the time

sorry to hear that

long ass game though
